GitHub

Functions for blackbody thermal emission (and its derivatives) calculation

TestingData — Module

This module contains some hardcoded data obtained from Berger, Chris G. 'Blackbody Calculator', Optics: The Website, https://www.opticsthewebsite.com/OpticsCalculators . Accessed on 5/14/2025

source
Main.TestingData.benchmark_data — Constant

The data for testing was obtained from

Berger, Chris G. 'Blackbody Calculator', Optics: The Website, https://www.opticsthewebsite.com/OpticsCalculators . Accessed on 5/14/2025
